flawed_nl_solution:
If 4 pugs can clean their house in 45 minutes, one pug will take 4*45 = <<4*45=180>>180 minutes.
Since one pug working alone takes 180 minutes to clean the house, fifteen pugs working together will be able to clean their house in 180/15 = <<180/15=21>>21 minutes
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
